question.text:
refer to the following notice.

NOTICE TO CUSTOMERS



As you all know, the property surrounding Bracht Storage is fully fenced, and all areas (1) continuously by a video surveillance system. Our meticulous cleaning practices also deter harmful pests. However, our commitment to (2) no longer stops there. As an extra precaution, Bracht now requires storage unit contents to be insured. (3) . The policy provides partial compensation for items damaged by fire, floods and other unexpected occurrences. For more comprehensive coverage, customers may opt (4) a policy from a specialised insurance carrier. A consultant can help determine which option is suitable for you.

answer.explanation: Use passive voice based on the phrase  "by a video surveillance system."
The actions performed in the previous sentence such as “… is fully fenced, … are filmed, … deter harmful pests” should choose B as the most appropriate.

choices: (A) Nevertheless, many prefer the indoor facilities.
(B) Separate units must be rented for additional items.
(C) Customers may obtain a basic plan directly from us.
(D) A licensed repair worker is on call at all times.

answer.text: (C) Customers may obtain a basic plan directly from us.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "As an extra precaution, Bracht now requires storage unit contents to be insured."
opt to + infinitive

question.text:
refer to the following memo.

To: All library staff From: Cameron Meach, Director
Subject: Budget and meeting
Date: December 5
Attachment: Proposals

This year, several of the events on which we usually spend the library's "Programs" budget have not taken place as expected. (1), our author readings scheduled for February were cancelled because of the heavy snowfall. This has left us with a sizable amount of money that must be spent on programs by the end of the year. In the attachment, I have listed a few ideas for how to do this. Please (2) them before Friday's meeting. We will discuss which one would best support the aim of (3) the library's usefulness to the community. With your valuable input, I feel certain we will (4) be able to take full advantage of this situation.

answer.explanation: The front says “several of the events … have not taken place as expected” and the back says “our author readings scheduled for February were canceled because of the heavy snowfall.” (given something that doesn't go as expected). Choosing D is the most reasonable
The front has “I have listed a few ideas for how to do this” and the back has “We will discuss which one would best support” so choose D as the most appropriate.
After preposition + V-ing

choices: (A) I also encourage you to make your own suggestions at that time.
(B) Thank you for the hard work you have put into planning this initiative.
(C) More recent patron surveys have tended to ask about other areas.
(D) Remember, we must take the reduced budget into account.

answer.text: (A) I also encourage you to make your own suggestions at that time.
answer.explanation: The following sentence has “With your valuable input,” (With your valuable input,) so choose A is the most reasonable.

question.text:
TO ALL CHESTER’S STEAKHOUSE CUSTOMERS



Chester’s Steakhouse ---1--- to bringing you the best dining experience, so it’s welcome news that our patio is finally open for the summer. While dining in the fresh air, please keep in mind that sections of this neighborhood are zoned as residential. Therefore, you should be ---2--- by monitoring your voice volume in the late evening, especially when walking past the apartments opposite our main entrance. Thank you in advance for your cooperation; it will help us to maintain a positive ---3--- with those living nearby. Should you prefer to move indoors at any time, we can easily accommodate you. ---4---.

answer.explanation: Based on structure "tobe commited to Ving"

Based on structure "should be + adj"
=> C is correct
Based on the meaning of words.

choices: (A) Just inform your server that you wish to do so,
(B) We appreciate your bringing this problem to our attention.
(C) As a result, the opening of the patio will be delayed.
(D) It may take longer to prepare the dish than usual.

answer.text: (A) Just inform your server that you wish to do so,
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "Should you prefer to move indoors at any time, we can easily accommodate you."

question.text:
To: Armando Michaud (armando@michauddrycleaning.com)
From: Ashville Bank (loans@ashvillebank.com)
Date: January 18
Subject: Small Business Loan

Dear Mr. Michaud,

Thank you for your interest in a small business loan from Ashville Bank. Please fill out the attached ---1---, which afford us information about your business model as well as your personal credit history. It is essential that you ---2--- accurate information on the form. Failure to do so could result in the delay or ---3--- the rejection of your application. While we do our best to accommodate all requests, we may not be able to issue you the full amount. ---4---.

Sincerely,

The Ashville Bank Loans Team

answer.explanation:
Based on structure: the + N and verb "afford"
=> Using plural noun "forms"
Based on structure "It is essential that + S + infinitive verb + ..."
Based on the meaning of words.

choices: (A) For this reason, our bank has received high customer service ratings.
(B) Nevertheless, we took your personal circumstances into consideration.
(C) In that case, there may still be other options available to you.
(D) Alternatively, you can check your balance to confirm that it was received.

answer.text: (C) In that case, there may still be other options available to you.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "While we do our best to accommodate all requests, we may not be able to issue you the full amount."

question.text:
Norcross Sleep Center

1200 Hanifan Lane * 461-555-0138



It is estimated that up to twenty percent of people suffer from a sleep problem. Many sleep issues may not be ---1--- to the affected person, so we recommend testing yourself even if you do not have severe symptoms. To have your condition assessed, visit our center in person, where our technicians can ---2--- a wide variety of sleep disorders. On the other hand, you may ---3--- test your sleep at home by renting a monitor. We will analyze the data after one week. A prescription is required for some of our devices, such as our continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) machines. ---4---.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.
Based on the meaning of words.
Based on the meaning of words. "comfortably test"

choices: (A) Each week, you will receive an updated report.
(B) Most reported success after a few weeks.
(C) Please take care of this as soon as possible.
(D) Others are available to general consumers.

answer.text: (D) Others are available to general consumers.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "A prescription is required for some of our devices, such as our continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) machines. "

question.text: October 6 —— Nicole Walt has accepted the role of National Transportation Advisor, replacing Leon Hixon, who is stepping down to start his own consulting business. Ms. Walt is ---1--- respected for her impressive security expertise. She ---2--- transportation in the southeast region of the country for several years, and supporters believe she will easily adapt to her larger-scale role. Analysts predict that she will soon push parliament to sell a section of the rail line to a corporation. A sale such as this would generate immediate profit for the national transportation system. ---3---. However, Walt will face strong opponents of the ---4--- of the system, as many believe publicly used services should stay in public hands.

answer.explanation: Based on the passive structure " be + adv + PII"
By signal "for for several years" => Using present perfect continuous

choices: (A) It is also expected to result in more reliable journey times.
(B) Fortunately, this is considered to be an unlikely scenario.
(C) For instance, she plans to focus on modernizing ticket processing.
(D) Each one would benefit the thousands of daily passengers.

answer.text: (A) It is also expected to result in more reliable journey times.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "A sale such as this would generate immediate profit for the national transportation system."
Based on the meaning of words.

question.text:
Royal Exchange Building Reborn as Hotel
Nationwide hotel operator Verdant Group____1 millions of pounds over three years converting the Royal Exchange Building on Quay street, a historical landmark, into a hotel.
"We wanted to preserve the building’s key architectural elements,” says Verdant’s CEO Gaile Edwards. “That's why we hired a group of historical experts to work with our team.” ____2.
The building retains much of its original charm as the 18th century structure and stonework remain intact. However, the building’s interior has all the____3 found at any other five-star accommodations, such as a pool and spa.
The combination of the hotel’s modern facilities with its historic appearance makes the venue a major ____4 for tourists. Already, suites are fully booked for its opening weekend, which is scheduled for late next month.

answer.explanation: Use past simple

choices: (A) It will take another year before the hotel opens its doors.
(B)This is Verdant Group’s first project that is a joint venture.
(C)Judging from the results, it seems that they were successful.
(D)Consequently, the construction firm’s initial proposal was rejected.

answer.text: (C)Judging from the results, it seems that they were successful.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence.
Based on the meaning of words.
By phrase "a major attraction"

question.text:
July 15
Allison Morita
Vestige Insurance
4186 Maryland Avenue
Pinellas, FL 34624

Dear Ms. Morita,

I am writing to you in the hope that you can ____1 my insurance claim. I spoke with general claims agent Gary Fink on July 6, ____2, at the time, explained the process and recommended that I write this letter.
Last month, on June 20, I suffered an injury when I slipped and fell in my kitchen. The impact caused me to break my wrist, which forced me to undergo surgery. Does my policy cover injuries of this nature? ____3. I expect to be reimbursed. Currently, my medical expenses amount to about $900. ____4.

Please respond as soon as you review my documentation.

Thank you.
Sincerely,
June Miller

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.
"who" is relative pronoun substitute for "Gary Fink"
Based on structure "If so, clause"

choices: (A) I have enclosed receipts to support this claim.
(B)Only half of the amount has been paid by your company.
(C)It is difficult to determine who was at fault for the accident.
(D)Let me know when my insurance contract has been authorized.

answer.text: (A) I have enclosed receipts to support this claim.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "Currently, my medical expenses amount to about $900."

question.text:
Welcome to Redstone National Park

For the protection of the park, all visitors are asked to observe some basic____1
Redstone National Park officially closes at 8 P.M. ____2, there are a number of campsites situated throughout the park for those who wish to stay overnight. It is important to note that this option is only available to those with permits. ____3.
We also ask that all visitors be thoughtful about maintaining the premises. Please make sure that rubbish and anything brought into wildlife areas is taken out upon leaving or disposed of in the appropriate receptacles.
Following these rules will help to ensure the ____4 of the park’s beauty for future visitors.
For any questions or concerns, please call 555-9092.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words "some basic policies"
The blank need to fill a conjunction to show the contrast between two clauses. => Choose "However"

choices: (A) We project that these campsites will becompleted by the end of the year.
(B)It must be closely monitored by park rangers at all times.
(C)The easiest way to get to the park is by taking a shuttle bus.
(D)These can be obtained at the visitor center every day until noon.

answer.text: (D)These can be obtained at the visitor center every day until noon.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "It is important to note that this option is only available to those with permits."
The blank need to fill a noun " the preservation"

question.text:
To: Janet Boyle (jboyle55@overmail.net)
From: Customer Service (service@lagoonair.com)
Subject: Your inquiry
Date: July 29
Attachment: Baggage claim form

Dear Ms. Boyle,

This is in reply to your inquiry about ____1 baggage. Problems involving luggage on domestic flights must be reported to airline personnel at an airport within 48 hours of flight arrival.
However, if you have flown in from outside the country, you may report any destruction to your luggage to claims@lagoonair.com using the attached form. Claims can also be ____2 in person at an airline office. ____3. The airline will not grant any claim made more than 14 days following your flight.
Lagoon Airlines is not liable for any harm to luggage that is of poor quality or possesses an inherent defect. ____4, reimbursement for repairs is not offered for minor wear and tear.

Sincerely,
Lagoon Airlines Customer Service

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words. "damaged baggage"
Based on the meaning of words. " Claims can also be submitted "

choices: (A) You will receive confirmation of your flight reservation by e-mail.
(B)Refer to your ticket to view the baggage allowance for this flight.
(C)We will deliver the bag to your address after it has been recovered.
(D) Please note that there is a deadline to apply for reimbursement.

answer.text: (D) Please note that there is a deadline to apply for reimbursement.
answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of previous sentence.
Use a conjunction to add information. => Choose "Additionally"
